title: Red Receives a Mysterious Letter
summary: Red Riding Hood receives a letter from her grandmother, requesting an urgent visit and hinting at a family secret. Red decides to travel through the forest despite warnings from her mother, who suspects trouble. Red packs a basket of supplies and sets off, determined to uncover the truth.

title: Red Encounters the Woodsman
summary: Red meets a charming woodsman named Elias on the forest path, who offers to escort her. She hesitates, recalling her mother’s warning about strangers, but ultimately agrees after Elias proves his knowledge of a shortcut. Their banter reveals mutual attraction, and they decide to travel together.

title: Wolf's Interception and Deception
summary: A cunning stranger, Lucien Wolf, intercepts Red and Elias, feigning concern for Red's safety. Lucien distracts Elias with a fabricated emergency, then subtly manipulates Red into revealing her destination. Motivated by jealousy and curiosity, Lucien races ahead to reach Grandmother’s house first.

title: Grandmother’s Disappearance
summary: Lucien arrives at Grandmother’s cottage and discovers she is missing, leaving behind clues of a struggle. Lucien stages the scene and impersonates Grandmother, intending to win Red’s affection by playing the hero. Meanwhile, Red and Elias arrive, suspicious of the odd behavior and the empty house.

title: The Confrontation at the Cottage
summary: Red and Elias confront 'Grandmother,' quickly realizing it is Lucien in disguise. A heated argument erupts; Elias accuses Lucien of endangering Red, and Red demands to know Lucien’s true intentions. Lucien confesses his feelings for Red and reveals Grandmother’s secret: she has run away to avoid matchmaking schemes.

title: Red’s Choice and Grandmother’s Return
summary: Grandmother returns, revealing she orchestrated the meeting to encourage Red to choose between her suitors. Red, frustrated by the manipulation but inspired by the events, makes her own choice—rejecting both Lucien and Elias initially, demanding honesty and genuine affection. The trio agrees to start over, letting Red decide her future on her own terms.
